TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Lamuan, title = Lamuan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lamuan} }

S.FORM: Lamuan Itiniay i Zhuoxi Cen no Hualien ko Lamuan a niyaro', 34 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 146 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 99% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 144 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 1% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 2 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun 88%, Amis 1%, Paiwan 1%, Cou 1%, roma 8%.

Lamoan Itiniay i Zhooxi Cen no Hoalien ko Lamoan a niyaro', 34 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 146 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 99% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 144 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 1% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 2 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon 88%, Amis 1%, Paiwan 1%, Coo 1%, roma 8%.
